active.description: If set to 'false', the Product Module is disabled. Licensees can not obtain any new Licenses for this Product Module.

licenseTemplate.description: License Template. Mandatory for 'Try & Buy' licensing model.

licensingModel.description: Licensing model applied to this Product Module. Defines what License Templates can be configured for the Product Module and how Licenses for this Product Module are processed during validation.

maxCheckoutValidity.description: Maximum checkout validity (days). Mandatory for 'Floating' licensing model.

name.description: Product Module name that is visible to the end customers in NetLicensing Shop.

nodeSecretMode.description: Secret Mode. Mandatory for 'Node-Locked' licensing model.

number.description: Unique number (across all Products of a Vendor) that identifies the Product Module. Vendor can assign this number when creating a Product Module or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first Licensee for the Product.

productNumber.description: Unique number (across all Products of a Vendor) that identifies the Product Module. Vendor can assign this number when creating a Product Module or let NetLicensing generate one. Read-only after creation of the first Licensee for the Product.

redThreshold.description: Remaining time volume for red level. Mandatory for 'Rental' licensing model.

yellowThreshold.description: Remaining time volume for yellow level. Mandatory for 'Rental' licensing model.
